dap

Class ItemsOut

  • java.lang.Object
    • dap.ItemsOut

  • public class ItemsOut
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to create new ItemsOut objects, get their data, check them out to a patron, and return them.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ItemsOut(java.lang.String itemNumber, java.lang.String patronNumber, java.lang.String checkoutDate, java.lang.String dueDate)
      Constructor for ItemsOut class which initializes an ItemsOut object with the required data.

      • ItemsOut

        public ItemsOut(java.lang.String itemNumber,
        java.lang.String patronNumber,
        java.lang.String checkoutDate,
        java.lang.String dueDate)
        Constructor for ItemsOut class which initializes an ItemsOut object with the required data.
        Parameters:
        itemNumber - The checked out item's item number.
        patronNumber - The patron number of the patron who checked out the item.
        checkoutDate - The date the item was checked out.
        dueDate - The date the item is due(2 weeks from today).

        Uses the Calendar class to add 2 weeks(14 days) to today's date

        Returns:
